text: Haworth ( Keller, Karen. "Day Trip: Haworth", New Jersey Monthly, December 19, 2007. Accessed September 3, 2017. "There are three ways to pronounce the name of this beguiling Bergen County hamlet: hah-worth, ho-ah-worth, and hay-worth. (The mayor opts for the first.) However you pronounce it, don't miss it.") is a borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the borough's population was 3,343. ==References== Category:Boroughs in Bergen County, New Jersey
title: Haworth, New Jersey
